name: Diamond Joyce and the Secret of Crystal Cave
description: Diamond Joyce and the Secret of Crystal Cave is an action puzzle game with quest for long-lost treasures buried in pitch black caves, pyramids and temples of ancient civilizations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible Storage: 30 MB available space
